statements: SELECT * FROM production_downtime_logs ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT id, incident_cause, downtime_duration FROM production_downtime_logs WHERE incident_cause = 'Machine Failure';
SELECT id, resolution FROM production_downtime_logs WHERE downtime_duration > INTERVAL '2 hours';
SELECT incident_date, incident_cause, resolution FROM production_downtime_logs WHERE incident_date >= TIMESTAMP '2022-10-01' AND incident_date <= TIMESTAMP '2022-10-31' ORDER BY incident_date;
SELECT * FROM production_downtime_logs WHERE incident_cause LIKE '%Planned%' ORDER BY downtime_duration DESC;
SELECT id, incident_date, downtime_duration, incident_cause, resolution FROM production_downtime_logs
SELECT * FROM production_downtime_logs WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' AND incident_cause = 'Machine Failure'
SELECT id, resolution FROM production_downtime_logs WHERE downtime_duration >= INTERVAL '1 hour'
SELECT * FROM production_downtime_logs ORDER BY incident_date DESC
SELECT incident_date, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM production_downtime_logs GROUP BY incident_date
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT cause, resolution FROM incidents WHERE downtime_duration > 30;
SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT cause_description FROM root_causes WHERE incident_id = 5;
SELECT id, cause, resolution FROM incidents WHERE cause LIKE '%network%';
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT id, cause, resolution FROM incidents WHERE downtime_duration > 30;
SELECT id, timestamp, downtime_duration FROM incidents ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT incidents.id, root_causes.cause_description FROM incidents JOIN root_causes ON incidents.id = root_causes.incident_id WHERE root_causes.cause_description LIKE '%network%';
SELECT MAX(downtime_duration), MIN(downtime_duration), AVG(downtime_duration) FROM incidents;
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT id, incident_date, description FROM incidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, cause FROM causes ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM resolutions WHERE resolution LIKE '%resolved%';
SELECT id, downtime_start, downtime_end FROM incidents ORDER BY downtime_start DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT description, incident_date FROM incidents WHERE incident_date='2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM causes INNER JOIN incidents ON causes.incident_id = incidents.id WHERE cause='Human Error';
SELECT id, description FROM incidents WHERE DATE_PART('hour', downtime_end - downtime_start) > 2;
SELECT * FROM resolutions WHERE incident_id IN (SELECT id FROM incidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01');
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT id, description FROM incidents ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM causes WHERE incident_id = 3;
SELECT resolution_description FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT incident_id, cause_description FROM causes JOIN root_causes ON causes.cause_description = root_causes.cause_description;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, description FROM incidents ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM causes WHERE incident_id = 2;
SELECT incidents.id, incidents.description, resolutions.resolution_description FROM incidents JOIN resolutions ON incidents.id = resolutions.incident_id;
SELECT MAX(incident_id) AS max_incident_id FROM resolutions;
SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT cause_name, description FROM causes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT resolution_name, solution FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_name LIKE '%fix%';
SELECT * FROM root_causes WHERE cause_id = 3 AND resolution_id = 5;
SELECT id, downtime_start, duration FROM downtime_logs ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT cause_name, description FROM causes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT resolution_name, solution FROM resolutions ORDER BY resolution_name DESC;
SELECT incident_id, cause_id, resolution_id FROM root_causes WHERE cause_id = 2;
SELECT id, incident_id, duration FROM downtime_logs WHERE duration > '1 hour';
